titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Benoni J. Truslow, Class of 1934, Sheffield Scientific School, Photograph Collection Documenting Life at Yale
Truslow (Benoni J), Class of 1934, Sheffield Scientific School, Photograph Collection Documenting Life at Yale
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:13

did.unittitle: Benoni J. Truslow, Class of 1934, Sheffield Scientific School, photograph collection documenting life at Yale

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The collection consists of black and white photographs of Benoni J. Truslow (Yale 1934S) documenting Yale individuals, events, and activities, including reunions and graduation.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 48-A (YRG 48-A), Yale pictorial records and collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Benoni J. Truslow, Class of 1934, Sheffield Scientific School, Photograph Collection Documenting Life at Yale (RU 776). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of black and white photographs of Benoni J. Truslow (Yale 1934S) documenting Yale individuals, events, and activities, including reunions and graduation.

controlaccess.corpname: Yale University. Sheffield Scientific School. Class of 1934
